title: Fiscal policy to reduce PL causes unemployment

content.question: If policy makers use fiscal policy to reduce inflation, which of the following will most likely happen in the short run?

choices.label: The real interest rate will increase.
The nominal interest rate will increase.
The economy will remain at the natural rate of unemployment.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
